str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A mother. Apparently a primary word; a 'mother'.
Zebedee, father of the apostles James and John. Of Hebrew origin; Zebedaeus, an Israelite.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
